Package BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors

Class VortexMotor

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors.VortexMotor
All Implemented Interfaces:
MotorIO
public class VortexMotor extends Object implements MotorIO
The NeoMotor class implements the MotorIO interface and provides an abstraction for controlling a Neo v1.1 motor. It handles motor initialization, configuration, and control operations such as setting speed, angle, and performing fault checks.

  • Nested Class Summary

      Constructs a NeoMotor instance with the specified CAN ID, bus name, and configuration.
      Parameters:
      details - The CAN details of the motor.
      busname - The bus name where the motor is connected.
      config - The motor configuration settings.
